scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w packages/shared-config -w packages/shared-types -w packages/shared-utils -w packages/ui
scripts.db:init: cd apps/edge-api && wrangler d1 execute store-platform-db --local --file=../../infra/db/schema.sql
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/edge-api && wrangler d1 execute store-platform-db --local --file=../../infra/db/seed.sql
